Eternal Eclipse

Eternal Eclipse plays a modern take on 80s glam rock mixed with punk rock.

Draven Darkstar, lead singer aka Loren Blackwood
Aiden Shadowcaster, lead guitarist aka Thomas Kennedy
Issac Dreamweaver, drummer aka Morgan Sheridan

Discography

Album Names:

  1. Eternal Nightfall
  2. Glamour in Shadows
  3. Bloodlust Anthem
  4. Requiem of the Night
  5. Midnight Masquerade
  6. Specters and Soundwaves
  7. Vampire Dreams
  8. Twilight Rebellion
  9. Nocturnal Symphony
  10. Dark Desires Unleashed

Smash Hits:

  1. Bite the Bullet: An electrifying anthem that captivates audiences with its edgy guitar riffs and hauntingly catchy chorus.
  2. Crimson Desire: A soulful ballad with powerful vocals that explore the complexities of vampire existence and love.
  3. Nightstalker: An upbeat and rebellious track that channels the energy of 80s glam bands, with a modern punk rock twist.
  4. Eclipse of Hearts: A heart-wrenching power ballad that reveals the emotional turmoil of a vampire's immortal life.
  5. Midnight Reverie: A high-energy rock anthem that celebrates the allure of the night and the supernatural.

NexaVerse

NexaVerse is a popular social media platform that encompasses all the benefits of the major platforms in our world with the simplicity of being all in one place. NexaVerse has long form video, short form videos that can be permanent or temporary, pictures, text only in both long and short form. It is the go to place for all things digitally social.
